description.S1: Grace Romero, one of the deserters camped at the Botanical Lab,
description.S2: has asked you to look for a missing deserter named Zoe.

blurb.B1: The quest is started by speaking to Grace Romero at the entrance to the botanical labs.
blurb.B2: She is concerned about members of her camp "wandering out" of it.
blurb.B3: In particular, a deserter named Zoe Chandler went missing a couple of nights ago and Grace is worried that marauders may have gotten her.
blurb.B4: She does not know where Zoe may have gone but suggests that the Stranger check her room or speak to Stefan Garcia,
blurb.B5: with whom Zoe used to be close.

description.S1: Grace doesn't know where Zoe might have gone.
description.S2: She suggested checking the shack where Zoe beds down for any hints at where she might have gone.

blurb.B1: Speaking with Stefan Garcia will not give any clues to Zoe's whereabouts.
blurb.B2: However, Stefan will reveal that he and Zoe used to watch the serial, The Masked Marketeer, together
blurb.B3: and that he was planning to surprise her with a genuine copy of the latest episode before she went missing.
blurb.B4: He will also allude to her habit of writing things down on pieces of paper ("journaling"),
blurb.B5: which he considers a bit odd.
blurb.B6: Zoe's house is located in the southeast of the botanical labs.
blurb.B7: Pages from her journal can be found inside and Page 22 will reveal that Zoe left the camp to join the marauders and become a bandit queen.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: I don't know you.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Whatever you're looking for, it ain't here. Move along.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What's your problem?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm leaving.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Armed strangers wandering into my camp, for one. Some of my camp wandering out, for another.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You obviously run a tight ship.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Who's been wandering out of your camp?

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: You wanna try standing outside in the heat, keeping your sights open for the next marauder raid?

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: No, I'm sorry. That was unworthy of me. Lady named Zoe went missing some nights ago. Just up and vanished without a trace. Now I'm pacing around wondering if marauders got to her.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll keep an eye out.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You could always go looking for her.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Don't tell me you're scared of a few marauders.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Good luck with that.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: It's not like Zoe to go wandering. Figured she might be out scavenging, but that ain't exactly her talent.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Can't imagine where she's gone. Vale's a wide place. She could be anywhere.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Unless marauders got to her. Then parts of her could be in a lot of places.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Don't worry about it. I'll find her.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Could do without the gallows humor.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: What is it?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll leave you be.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Appreciate it. Honest.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: I go looking for Zoe, I leave the camp undefended, seeing as I'm the only one of us who knows her way 'round a gun. Hence my dilemma.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Any idea where she might be hiding?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Maybe the marauders took her away.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: How well do you know her?

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Vex me. If she told anybody, they ain't telling me. I'd check her room, but I got yelled at for snooping once already.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You snooped around in her room?

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Little ways ago. She was always obsessing over her serial dramas. Wanted to see what the fuss was about.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Could be. Dangers aplenty out there. No telling why marauders would steal somebody like Zoe. Got no useful skills far as I can tell.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Any chance you could point me somewhere specific, and not just "out there"?

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Marauder gang just moved into the districts a little ways east. Their numbers are growing. Gotta come from somewhere.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Well enough to know we never got on. Zoe and Stefan were close. If anybody knows the workings of her mind, he does.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You seem so personable. Can't imagine how you didn't get on with her.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: She was lazy and thoughtless. But she's still one of our own.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: I've crossed off my share of marauders. This ain't about them.

dialog.speaker: GraceRomero (Female)
dialog.utterance: Got anything in you besides questions?
